Class Search

java.lang.Object
backend.strategy.Search
public class Search extends Object
Context class that uses a SearchStrategy to perform book searches. The strategy can be changed at runtime using setStrategy().

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Search(SearchStrategy strategy)
    Constructs a Search context with the given strategy.

  • Constructor Details

    • Search

      public Search(SearchStrategy strategy)
      Constructs a Search context with the given strategy.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the initial search strategy to use

  • Method Details

    • setStrategy

      public void setStrategy(SearchStrategy strategy)
      Sets or changes the search strategy at runtime.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the new search strategy

    • performSearch

      public List<Book> performSearch(List<Book> books, String keyword)
      Performs the search using the current strategy.
      Parameters:
      books - the list of books to search
      keyword - the keyword to search for
      Returns:
      a list of books matching the keyword according to the strategy
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the strategy is not set
